content: चि {vI.v} {c5c} <ab>U.</ab> (चिनोति, चिनुते, चिकाचा-य, चिच्ये-क्ये, अचैषीत्-अचेष्ट, चेतुं, -चित; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} चाययति, चापयति, also चययति, चपयति, {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} चिचीषति, -चिकीषति) {@--1@} To collect, gather, accumulate (said to govern two accusatives being a द्विकर्मक root, but this use is very rare in classical literature); वृक्षं पुष्पाणि चिन्वती. {@--2@} To gather for oneself, acquire, gain; चिचीषतां जन्मवतामलघ्वीं भूतिं <ls>Ki. 3. 11</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">2. 19</ls>, <ls>Mv. 3. 4.</ls> {@--3@} To search, look out for; <ls>Bh. 3. 46.</ls> {@--4@} To pile or heap up, place in a line; पर्वतानिव ते भूमावचैर्षुवानरोत्तमान् <ls>Bk. 15. 76.</ls> {@--5@} To set, inlay, cover or fill with, see चित. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} To bear fruit, grow, increase, thrive, prosper; सिच्यते चीयते चैव लता पुष्पफलप्रदा <ls>Pt. 1. 222</ls> bears fruit; चीयते बालिशस्यापि सत्क्षेत्रपतिता कृषिः <ls>Mu. 1. 3</ls>; गजहंस तव सैव शुभ्रता चीयते न च न चापचीयते <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> {vII.v} {c3c} <ab>P.</ab> (चिकेति) <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} To observe, see, perceive. {@--2@} To look steadfastly upon. {@--3@} To be intent upon. {@--4@} To seek for, search, investigate, make inquiries, search through. {vIII.v} {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (चयते) {@--1@} To detest, hate. {@--2@} To revenge, take vengeance on. {vIV.v} {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (चायति-ते) {@--1@} To fear, dread, be afraid of (with <ab>acc.</ab>). {@--2@} To respect, honour. {@--3@} To observe; <ab>cf.</ab> चाय्.
